title: Would you consider buying Samsung's Foldable Phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not in its current form, no. I have seen the crease from the videos. I just feel like they'd look worse in real life. Also, I'm not sure of the performance and battery life yet. Generally, I’d avoid getting first-gen products, unless money isn't a problem.
Probably not. Too awkward to use and stow. If you want larger size. Get a tablet or a laptop. There are very large phones available, also.
